video.title: Tonari no Kaibutsu-kun
video.synopsis: Shizuku, a hardworking student who isn't interested in socializing, finds an unlikely friend in Haru, an emotionally volatile boy at her school.

episodes.synopsis: At her teacher's request, good girl Shizuku Mizutani delivers homework to suspended delinquent genius Haru Yoshido and begins an unusual friendship.
episodes.title: Sitting Next to Yoshida-kun

episodes.synopsis: Shizuku has been acting weird ever since Haru surprised her with a kiss, but she has to pull it together to focus on her studies.
episodes.title: Weird

episodes.synopsis: Shizuku shakes off the effects of Haru's kiss and denies her feelings. Meanwhile, she and some other students build a coop for Nagoya the rooster.
episodes.title: Nuisance

episodes.synopsis: Shizuku tries to heal Haru's tarnished social reputation. Then, the group of friends returns from a mountain vacation to meet Haru's brother, Yuzan.
episodes.title: Summer Break

episodes.synopsis: To Shizuku, Haru's past is a mystery -- until Yuzan confesses how their father kicked Haru out of the house. Meanwhile, Haru has a new admirer.
episodes.title: Yoshida Family Matters

episodes.synopsis: Confused feelings collide when Shizuku tries to ignore Haru to focus on studies, and Chizuru hopes to overcome her shyness and catch Haru's eye.
episodes.title: Girls Feeling Melancholy

episodes.synopsis: Her relationship with Haru is an emotional roller coaster, so Shizuku tries to make schoolwork her top priority but can't get Haru out of her mind.
episodes.title: The Distance Between Us

episodes.synopsis: It's Syoyo Festival day, but there's tension between Shizuku and Haru. Even their friends admit, it's time for them to have a heart-to-heart talk.
episodes.title: Come Down to Syoyo Festival!

episodes.synopsis: More of everyone's past is revealed, Shizuku deals with her strained mother/daughter relationship and Kenji plants a seed of jealousy.
episodes.title: All or Nothing

episodes.synopsis: The holidays are a time of celebration as Asako plans a surprise party, but Haru's jealousy is out of control and his punk friends crash the fun.
episodes.title: Christmas

episodes.synopsis: Though Shizuku confessed her feelings for Haru, Kenji can't stop flirting with her -- and Haru decides to confront Kenji and learn to communicate.
episodes.title: The Yamaguchis' Son, Kenji-kun

episodes.synopsis: The school year comes to a close, leaving a lonely Asako to return to her online community -- until Shizuku reaches out and makes her a true friend.
episodes.title: The Year Draws To A Close

episodes.synopsis: The new year brings a fresh start for Haru, who reveals his true character to everyone and tells Shizuku a romantic story about a firefly.
episodes.title: Spring is Near
